name: ui
description: UI/UX screenshot and mockup quality review

criteria.name: Visual Hierarchy
criteria.description: Is there a clear visual hierarchy? Are headings, buttons, and primary actions prominent?

criteria.name: Consistency
criteria.description: Are colors, fonts, spacing, and component styles consistent throughout?

criteria.name: Readability
criteria.description: Is text legible? Sufficient contrast? Appropriate font sizes?

criteria.name: Layout & Spacing
criteria.description: Is the layout well-structured with appropriate whitespace and alignment?

criteria.name: Accessibility
criteria.description: Does the design consider color contrast, touch targets, alt text, and screen reader compatibility?

criteria.name: Responsiveness
criteria.description: Does the design appear to adapt well to different screen sizes or does it show responsive intent?
